info.name: Testes_e-commerce_Serverest
info.description: Testes em Postman no e-commerce para testadores [https://serverest.dev/](https://serverest.dev/)

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X 'POST' \
  'https://serverest.dev/usuarios' \
  -H 'accept: application/json' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
  "nome": "Fulano da Silva",
  "email": "beltrano@qa.com.br",
  "password": "teste",
  "administrador": "true"
}'
